thread.title: Premier Boxing Champions card nearing completion
thread.title_full: Premier Boxing Champions card nearing completion - San Antonio Express-News

author: John Whisler
title: Premier Boxing Champions card nearing completion
text:
Matches are set in all but one of the 13 bouts scheduled for Tuesday’s Premier Boxing Champions card at Cowboys Dancehall.
Doors open at 5 p.m. First bell is scheduled for 5:05. The televised (Fox Sports 1) portion of the card begins at 8.
The weigh-in is scheduled for 12:30 p.m. Monday at the Crowne Plaza San Antonio Airport hotel , 1111 NE Loop 410.
Tuesday’ lineup:
Julius Jackson (19-0, 15 KOs), Virgin Islands, vs. Jose Uzcategui (23-1, 19 KOs), Venezuela, 12 rds., IBF super middleweight title
Miguel Vasquez (35-4, 13 KOs), Guadalajara, Mexico, vs. Argenis Mendez (22-3-1, 12 KOs), Dominican Republic, 10, lightweights
Steven Lovett (13-0, 11 KOs), New South Wales, vs. TBA, 8, cruiserweights
Ryan Karl (8-0, 6 KOs), Brenham, vs. Alfonso Olvera (4-1, 2 KOs), Tucson, Arizona, 6, welterweights
Justin DeLoach (11-1, 6 KOs), Houston, vs. Todd Manuel (10-8-1, 1 KO), Crowley, Louisiana, 6, super welterweights
Tony Adeniran (1-0), San Antonio, vs. Jonathan Heard (0-1), Baton Rouge, Louisiana, 4, middleweights
Cresencio Ramos (4-0, 3 KOs), San Antonio, vs. Cesar Martinez (0-6-3), Round Rock, 4, featherweights
James Leija Jr. (1-0), San Antonio, vs. LD Herbert (0-4), Houston, 4, junior welterweights
Enrique Neira Jr. (3-0), San Angelo, vs. Eddie Tigs (1-5-3), San Antonio, 4, super middleweights
Joseph Rodriguez (9-0, 2 KOs), San Antonio, vs. Jesus Sandoval (5-7-3, 1 KO), Redwood, California, 6, super featherweights
Ramon Cardenas (1-0), San Antonio, vs. Jamie Hernandez (1-3-2), Killeen, 4, super bantamweights
Daniel Baiz (2-0, 2 KOs), San Antonio, vs. Alberto Espinosa (3-7), Laredo, 4, junior middleweights
Ricky Edwards (8-0, 3 KOs), Paterson, New Jersey, vs. Evencii Dixon (5-10-1, 2 KOs), Lancaster, Pennsylvania, 6, junior welterweights
